Judul: ���Pseudosatellites��� tantalize atmospheric scientists: Planes and airships that can soar through the stratosphere could enable new research.
Abstrak:
In April, if all goes to plan, a spindly uncrewed aeroplane with a wingspan wider than a jumbo jet will take flight in Puerto Rico. Powered by solar panels and soaring up to
20kilometres high, the plane, called Odysseus, will test a new kind of high-altitude, longduration  flight — on which researchers will soon fly instruments
Fakultas: Fakultas Matematika dan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam
